titleStmt.title: A letter sent from a worthy divine to the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor of the city of London being a true relation of the battaile fought betweene His Majesty and His Excellence the Earle of Essex : from Warwicke castle the 24 of October 1642, at two a clock in the morning : together with a prayer for the happy uniting of the King and Parliament, fit to be used by all good Christians daily in their houses.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Adoniram, d. 1660.

notesStmt.note: Letter from A. Byfield? cf. BM.
Lord Mayor of London: Sir Richard Gurney.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
